## DefaultApp.registerStyle() method

API for developers to register [AppStyles](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) lazily.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerStyle(style: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | any | The [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) to register. |

void
